title: 60 FPS WOTV on BlueStacks
snippet: After seeing limit bursts at 60+ FPS I don’t want to go back.  Now I prefer playing on my emulator because of it.  I’ve included these steps that have worked for me in hopes that they will work for you as well.How To01. Download BlueStacks 4If you don’t have it already, head over to the BlueStack...
